input.sentences: i visited my brother in his new city .
there was a parade he wanted me to go to .
i saw people that looked like giant bats .
i statue of the city 's founder faces north .
the capitol building looked very cool as i left in the night .
output.sentences: When we visited the city, we met my brother.
There was a lot of people dancing and the costumes looked like they had giant wings.
After the parade we visited a statue to the north of the founder of the city.
Once night fell, we looked at the capital building and left.
